There are many real-time discussion channels for the Ubuntu community.

== Libera.chat ==
As a result of a <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-irc/2021-May/001923.html|May 2021 IRC council decision]]</nowiki>, all channels have since moved to the Libera.Chat IRC network.

'''Please connect your IRC client to:'''
 '''<nowiki>[[ircs:--irc.libera.chat:6697|irc.libera.chat, port 6697]]</nowiki>''' (TLS)<<BR>>
For non-TLS, use: <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.libera.chat:6667|irc.libera.chat, port 6667]]</nowiki>

'''Website:''' <nowiki>[[https://libera.chat/]]</nowiki> - provides configurations suitable for most IRC clients
